adverb.description: Without guilt for a crime or offense.
examples: the lawyer says that his client was acting innocently

adverb.description: Without responsibility for or direct involvement in an event yet suffering its consequences.
examples: he was shot at through a window while innocently walking past the house

adverb.description: In a manner that is uncorrupted or free from moral wrong.
examples: a charming tale with children innocently singing the chorus

adverb.description: With no intention of causing harm or offense.
examples: my cab driver innocently asked me what I did for a living
